languages.text:
The Overseer chooses an enemy in their line of sight and an unoccupied cell adjacent to it. The cyber-eagle moves to that cell (can move through occupied cells) without provoking attacks of opportunity. If the designated enemy has a melee weapon only, it attacks the cyber-eagle, using the lowest AP-cost attack. If that enemy has a ranged weapon, it shoots at the cyber-eagle, using the lowest AP-cost attack, with an additional +50% chance to hit that enemy's allies, if there are any within a cone behind the cyber-eagle. Then, the cyber-eagle attacks this enemy, dealing +{uip|Damage|53135057d69647a7854e578c5ef40bba}% more damage and spending 0 AP.
While the cyber-eagle is in that cell, the designated enemy is {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstructed{/g}.
This ability can be used multiple times per turn, but each subsequent use within a round increases its cost by +1 AP until the end of round.

traits.locale_text:
The Overseer chooses an enemy he sees — and an empty adjacent cell. The Cyber-Eagle flies into that cell, making the chosen enemy {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}Obstructed{/g}: if equipped with a ranged weapon, they won’t run away and must shoot through the Cyber-Eagle, provoking a counter-attack thereafter. In addition, the enemy makes an attack through the Cyber-Eagle right after it lands. If the enemy can't make an attack, the Cyber-Eagle counter-attacks either way.
While flying, the Cyber-Eagle can pass through units and doesn't trigger attacks of opportunity.
This ability has no cooldown, but with each consequent use, its cost increases by +1 AP.
Available only if the Cyber-Eagle is not {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}Ascended{/g}.

languages.text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} chooses an enemy in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} and an unoccupied cell adjacent to it. The cyber-eagle moves to that cell (can move through occupied cells) without provoking {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}. If the designated enemy only has a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon, it attacks the cyber-eagle, using the lowest {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}-cost attack. If that enemy has a ranged weapon, it shoots at the cyber-eagle, using the lowest AP-cost attack, with an additional +50% chance to {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} that enemy's allies (if there are any within a cone behind the cyber-eagle). Then, the cyber-eagle attacks this enemy, dealing +{uip|Damage|53135057d69647a7854e578c5ef40bba}% more damage and spending 0 AP.
While the cyber-eagle is in that cell, the designated enemy is {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstructed{/g}.
This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} can be used multiple times per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, but each subsequent use within a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} increases its cost by +1 AP until the end of round.
languages.original_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Надзиратель{/g} выбирает врага в зоне {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}видимости{/g} и свободную клетку рядом с этим врагом. Киберорел перемещается в эту клетку (может пролетать через занятые клетки), не провоцируя {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}атаки по возможности{/g}. Если у выбранного врага есть только {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}рукопашное{/g} оружие, он совершает против киберорла атаку, требующую меньше всего {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g}. Если у него есть дистанционное оружие, он стреляет в киберорла атакой, требующей меньше всего ОД, с увеличенным на 50% шансом попасть в своих союзников, если они есть в конусе за киберорлом. Затем киберорел атакует этого врага, нанося увеличенный на {uip|Damage|53135057d69647a7854e578c5ef40bba}% урон, без затрат ОД.
Для этого врага {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}заблокирован обзор{/g}, пока киберорел находится в указанной клетке.
{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Способность{/g} можно применять несколько раз за {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g}, но каждое последующее применение в {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунде{/g} увеличивает ее стоимость на 1 ОД до конца раунда.

traits.locale_text:
Надзиратель выбирает врага в зоне видимости и свободную клетку рядом с этим врагом. Киберорел перемещается в эту клетку (может пролетать через занятые клетки), не провоцируя атаки по возможности. Если у выбранного врага есть только рукопашное оружие, он совершает против киберорла атаку, требующую меньше всего ОД. Если у него есть дистанционное оружие, он стреляет в киберорла атакой, требующей меньше всего ОД, с увеличенным на 50% шансом попасть в своих союзников, если они есть в конусе за киберорлом. Затем киберорел атакует этого врага, нанося увеличенный на {uip|Damage|53135057d69647a7854e578c5ef40bba}% урон, без затрат ОД.
Для этого врага {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}заблокирован обзор{/g}, пока киберорел находится в указанной клетке.
Способность можно применять несколько раз за ход, но каждое последующее применение в раунде увеличивает ее стоимость на 1 ОД до конца раунда.

Надзиратель выбирает врага в зоне видимости и свободную клетку рядом с этим врагом. Киберорел перемещается в эту клетку (может пролетать через занятые клетки), не провоцируя атаки по возможности. Если у выбранного врага есть только рукопашное оружие, он совершает против киберорла атаку, требующую меньше всего ОД. Если у него есть дистанционное оружие, он стреляет в киберорла атакой, требующей меньше всего ОД, с увеличенным на 50% шансом попасть в своих союзников, если они есть в конусе за киберорлом. Затем киберорел атакует этого врага, нанося увеличенный на {uip|Damage|53135057d69647a7854e578c5ef40bba}% урон, без затрат ОД.
Для этого врага {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}заблокирован обзор{/g}, пока киберорел находится в указанной клетке.
Способность можно применять несколько раз за ход, но каждое последующее применение в раунде увеличивает ее стоимость на 1 ОД до конца раунда.

languages.text:
Der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Aufseher{/g} wählt einen Gegner in seiner {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}Sichtlinie{/g} und ein angrenzendes freies Feld aus. Der Cyber-Adler bewegt sich zu diesem Feld (und kann dabei besetzte Felder passieren), ohne {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}Gelegenheitsangriffe{/g} zu provozieren. Hat das Ziel lediglich eine {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfwaffe{/g}, attackiert es den Cyber-Adler mit dem Angriff mit den geringsten {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}-Kosten. Hat der Gegner eine Fernkampfwaffe, feuert er mit dem Angriff mit den geringsten AP-Kosten auf den Cyber-Adler und hat eine zusätzliche Chance von +50 %, seine Verbündeten zu {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}treffen{/g} (sofern sich diese innerhalb des Kegels hinter dem Cyber-Adler aufhalten). Anschließend attackiert der Cyber-Adler diesen Gegner und fügt ihm für 0 AP +{uip|Damage|53135057d69647a7854e578c5ef40bba} % mehr Schaden zu.
Befindet sich der Cyber-Adler auf diesem Feld, wird der anvisierte {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}gehemmt{/g}.
Diese {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} kann mehrmals pro {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} eingesetzt werden, aber jeder weitere Einsatz innerhalb einer {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} kostet bis zum Ende der Runde +1 AP.
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} chooses an enemy in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} and an unoccupied cell adjacent to it. The cyber-eagle moves to that cell (can move through occupied cells) without provoking {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}. If the designated enemy only has a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon, it attacks the cyber-eagle, using the lowest {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}-cost attack. If that enemy has a ranged weapon, it shoots at the cyber-eagle, using the lowest AP-cost attack, with an additional +50% chance to {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} that enemy's allies (if there are any within a cone behind the cyber-eagle). Then, the cyber-eagle attacks this enemy, dealing +{uip|Damage|53135057d69647a7854e578c5ef40bba}% more damage and spending 0 AP.
While the cyber-eagle is in that cell, the designated enemy is {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstructed{/g}.
This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} can be used multiple times per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, but each subsequent use within a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} increases its cost by +1 AP until the end of round.

traits.locale_text:
Der Aufseher wählt einen Gegner in seiner Sichtlinie und ein angrenzendes freies Feld aus. Der Cyber-Adler bewegt sich zu diesem Feld (und kann dabei besetzte Felder passieren), ohne Gelegenheitsangriffe zu provozieren. Hat das Ziel lediglich eine Nahkampfwaffe, attackiert es den Cyber-Adler mit dem Angriff mit den geringsten AP-Kosten. Hat der Gegner eine Fernkampfwaffe, feuert er mit dem Angriff mit den geringsten AP-Kosten auf den Cyber-Adler und hat eine zusätzliche Chance von +50 %, seine Verbündeten zu treffen (sofern sich diese innerhalb des Kegels hinter dem Cyber-Adler aufhalten). Anschließend attackiert der Cyber-Adler diesen Gegner und fügt ihm für 0 AP +{uip|Damage|53135057d69647a7854e578c5ef40bba} % mehr Schaden zu.
Befindet sich der Cyber-Adler auf diesem Feld, wird der anvisierte {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}gehemmt{/g}.
Diese Fähigkeit kann mehrmals pro Zug eingesetzt werden, aber jeder weitere Einsatz innerhalb einer Runde kostet bis zum Ende der Runde +1 AP.

Der Aufseher wählt einen Gegner in seiner {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}Sichtlinie{/g} und ein angrenzendes freies Feld aus. Der Cyber-Adler bewegt sich zu diesem Feld (und kann dabei besetzte Felder passieren), ohne {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}Gelegenheitsangriffe{/g} zu provozieren. Hat das Ziel lediglich eine Nahkampfwaffe, attackiert es den Cyber-Adler mit dem Angriff mit den geringsten {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}-Kosten. Hat der Gegner eine Fernkampfwaffe, feuert er mit dem Angriff mit den geringsten AP-Kosten auf den Cyber-Adler und hat eine zusätzliche Chance von +50 %, seine Verbündeten zu {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}treffen{/g} (sofern sich diese innerhalb des Kegels hinter dem Cyber-Adler aufhalten). Anschließend attackiert der Cyber-Adler diesen Gegner und fügt ihm für 0 AP +{uip|Damage|53135057d69647a7854e578c5ef40bba} % mehr Schaden zu.
Befindet sich der Cyber-Adler auf diesem Feld, wird der anvisierte {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}gehemmt{/g}.
Diese {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} kann mehrmals pro Zug eingesetzt werden, aber jeder weitere Einsatz innerhalb einer Runde kostet bis zum Ende der Runde +1 AP.

Der Aufseher wählt einen Gegner in seiner {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}Sichtlinie{/g} und ein angrenzendes freies Feld aus. Der Cyber-Adler bewegt sich zu diesem Feld (und kann dabei besetzte Felder passieren), ohne {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}Gelegenheitsangriffe{/g} zu provozieren. Hat das Ziel lediglich eine Nahkampfwaffe, attackiert es den Cyber-Adler mit dem Angriff mit den geringsten {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}-Kosten. Hat der Gegner eine Fernkampfwaffe, feuert er mit dem Angriff mit den geringsten AP-Kosten auf den Cyber-Adler und hat eine zusätzliche Chance von +50 %, seine Verbündeten zu {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}treffen{/g} (sofern sich diese innerhalb des Kegels hinter dem Cyber-Adler aufhalten). Anschließend attackiert der Cyber-Adler diesen Gegner und fügt ihm für 0 AP +{uip|Damage|53135057d69647a7854e578c5ef40bba} % mehr Schaden zu.
Befindet sich der Cyber-Adler auf diesem Feld, wird der anvisierte {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}gehemmt{/g}.
Diese {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} kann mehrmals pro Zug eingesetzt werden, aber jeder weitere Einsatz innerhalb einer Runde kostet bis zum Ende der Runde +1 AP.

languages.text:
Le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}surveillant{/g} sélectionne un ennemi dans sa {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}ligne de mire{/g}, ainsi qu'une case inoccupée et adjacente à la cible. Le cyber-aigle rejoint cette case (en traversant les cases occupées) sans provoquer d'{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attaques d'opportunité{/g}. Si la cible n'a qu'une arme de {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}mêlée{/g}, elle lance son attaque coûtant le moins de {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} sur le cyber-aigle. Si elle a une arme à distance, elle lance son attaque coûtant le moins de PA sur le cyber-aigle, avec +50 % de chances de {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}toucher{/g} ses alliés situés dans un cône derrière le cyber-aigle. Le cyber-aigle attaque ensuite la cible en lui infligeant +{uip|Damage|53135057d69647a7854e578c5ef40bba} % de dégâts, sans dépenser de PA.
Tant que le cyber-aigle se trouve sur cette case, la cible est {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstruée{/g}.
Cette {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} peut être utilisée plusieurs fois par {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}, mais chaque utilisation supplémentaire au cours du même {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} augmente son coût de +1 PA jusqu'à la fin du round.
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} chooses an enemy in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} and an unoccupied cell adjacent to it. The cyber-eagle moves to that cell (can move through occupied cells) without provoking {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}. If the designated enemy only has a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon, it attacks the cyber-eagle, using the lowest {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}-cost attack. If that enemy has a ranged weapon, it shoots at the cyber-eagle, using the lowest AP-cost attack, with an additional +50% chance to {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} that enemy's allies (if there are any within a cone behind the cyber-eagle). Then, the cyber-eagle attacks this enemy, dealing +{uip|Damage|53135057d69647a7854e578c5ef40bba}% more damage and spending 0 AP.
While the cyber-eagle is in that cell, the designated enemy is {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstructed{/g}.
This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} can be used multiple times per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, but each subsequent use within a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} increases its cost by +1 AP until the end of round.

traits.locale_text:
Le surveillant sélectionne un ennemi dans sa ligne de mire, ainsi qu'une case inoccupée et adjacente à la cible. Le cyber-aigle rejoint cette case (en traversant les cases occupées) sans provoquer d'attaques d'opportunité. Si la cible n'a qu'une arme de mêlée, elle lance son attaque coûtant le moins de PA sur le cyber-aigle. Si elle a une arme à distance, elle lance son attaque coûtant le moins de PA sur le cyber-aigle, avec +50 % de chances de toucher ses alliés situés dans un cône derrière le cyber-aigle. Le cyber-aigle attaque ensuite la cible en lui infligeant +{uip|Damage|53135057d69647a7854e578c5ef40bba} % de dégâts, sans dépenser de PA.
Tant que le cyber-aigle se trouve sur cette case, la cible est {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstruée{/g}.
Cette capacité peut être utilisée plusieurs fois par tour, mais chaque utilisation supplémentaire au cours du même round augmente son coût de +1 PA jusqu'à la fin du round.

Le surveillant sélectionne un ennemi dans sa {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}ligne de mire{/g}, ainsi qu'une case inoccupée et adjacente à la cible. Le cyber-aigle rejoint cette case (en traversant les cases occupées) sans provoquer d'{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attaques d'opportunité{/g}. Si la cible n'a qu'une arme de mêlée, elle lance son attaque coûtant le moins de {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} sur le cyber-aigle. Si elle a une arme à distance, elle lance son attaque coûtant le moins de PA sur le cyber-aigle, avec +50 % de chances de {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}toucher{/g} ses alliés situés dans un cône derrière le cyber-aigle. Le cyber-aigle attaque ensuite la cible en lui infligeant +{uip|Damage|53135057d69647a7854e578c5ef40bba} % de dégâts, sans dépenser de PA.
Tant que le cyber-aigle se trouve sur cette case, la cible est {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstruée{/g}.
Cette {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} peut être utilisée plusieurs fois par tour, mais chaque utilisation supplémentaire au cours du même round augmente son coût de +1 PA jusqu'à la fin du round.

Le surveillant sélectionne un ennemi dans sa {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}ligne de mire{/g}, ainsi qu'une case inoccupée et adjacente à la cible. Le cyber-aigle rejoint cette case (en traversant les cases occupées) sans provoquer d'{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attaques d'opportunité{/g}. Si la cible n'a qu'une arme de mêlée, elle lance son attaque coûtant le moins de {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} sur le cyber-aigle. Si elle a une arme à distance, elle lance son attaque coûtant le moins de PA sur le cyber-aigle, avec +50 % de chances de {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}toucher{/g} ses alliés situés dans un cône derrière le cyber-aigle. Le cyber-aigle attaque ensuite la cible en lui infligeant +{uip|Damage|53135057d69647a7854e578c5ef40bba} % de dégâts, sans dépenser de PA.
Tant que le cyber-aigle se trouve sur cette case, la cible est {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstruée{/g}.
Cette {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} peut être utilisée plusieurs fois par tour, mais chaque utilisation supplémentaire au cours du même round augmente son coût de +1 PA jusqu'à la fin du round.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}监察官{/g}选择{g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}视线{/g}范围内的一名敌人，同时选择目标敌人身边未被占据的格子。生化猎鹰立刻移动至目标格子（可以穿过被占据的格子），且此次移动不会触发{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}借机攻击{/g}。如果目标敌人仅拥有{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战{/g}武器，则会使用消耗{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}最低的攻击方式攻击生化猎鹰。如果目标敌人拥有远程武器，则会使用行动点数消耗最低的攻击方式，朝生化猎鹰所在的方向进行射击，同时有50%的额外几率{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}盟友（假如生化猎鹰所在方向的锥形范围内有盟友）。在此之后，生化猎鹰攻击目标敌人，此次攻击不消耗行动点数，且造成的伤害提高{uip|Damage|53135057d69647a7854e578c5ef40bba}%。
只要生化猎鹰留在当前格子里，目标敌人就始终处于{g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}视野遮蔽{/g}状态。
此{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}每{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}可多次使用，但在同一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}内，每次使用时消耗的行动点数都会提高1点。
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} chooses an enemy in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} and an unoccupied cell adjacent to it. The cyber-eagle moves to that cell (can move through occupied cells) without provoking {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}. If the designated enemy only has a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon, it attacks the cyber-eagle, using the lowest {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}-cost attack. If that enemy has a ranged weapon, it shoots at the cyber-eagle, using the lowest AP-cost attack, with an additional +50% chance to {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} that enemy's allies (if there are any within a cone behind the cyber-eagle). Then, the cyber-eagle attacks this enemy, dealing +{uip|Damage|53135057d69647a7854e578c5ef40bba}% more damage and spending 0 AP.
While the cyber-eagle is in that cell, the designated enemy is {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstructed{/g}.
This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} can be used multiple times per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, but each subsequent use within a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} increases its cost by +1 AP until the end of round.

traits.locale_text:
监察官选择视线范围内的一名敌人，同时选择目标敌人身边未被占据的格子。生化猎鹰立刻移动至目标格子（可以穿过被占据的格子），且此次移动不会触发借机攻击。如果目标敌人仅拥有近战武器，则会使用消耗行动点数最低的攻击方式攻击生化猎鹰。如果目标敌人拥有远程武器，则会使用行动点数消耗最低的攻击方式，朝生化猎鹰所在的方向进行射击，同时有50%的额外几率命中盟友（假如生化猎鹰所在方向的锥形范围内有盟友）。在此之后，生化猎鹰攻击目标敌人，此次攻击不消耗行动点数，且造成的伤害提高{uip|Damage|53135057d69647a7854e578c5ef40bba}%。
只要生化猎鹰留在当前格子里，目标敌人就始终处于{g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}视野遮蔽{/g}状态。
此能力每回合可多次使用，但在同一轮内，每次使用时消耗的行动点数都会提高1点。

监察官选择{g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}视线{/g}范围内的一名敌人，同时选择目标敌人身边未被占据的格子。生化猎鹰立刻移动至目标格子（可以穿过被占据的格子），且此次移动不会触发{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}借机攻击{/g}。如果目标敌人仅拥有近战武器，则会使用消耗{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}最低的攻击方式攻击生化猎鹰。如果目标敌人拥有远程武器，则会使用行动点数消耗最低的攻击方式，朝生化猎鹰所在的方向进行射击，同时有50%的额外几率{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}盟友（假如生化猎鹰所在方向的锥形范围内有盟友）。在此之后，生化猎鹰攻击目标敌人，此次攻击不消耗行动点数，且造成的伤害提高{uip|Damage|53135057d69647a7854e578c5ef40bba}%。
只要生化猎鹰留在当前格子里，目标敌人就始终处于{g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}视野遮蔽{/g}状态。
此{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}每回合可多次使用，但在同一轮内，每次使用时消耗的行动点数都会提高1点。

languages.text:
El {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}supervisor{/g} elige a un enemigo al que tenga {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}línea de visión{/g} y una casilla vacía adyacente a él. La ciberáguila se mueve a esa casilla (pudiendo atravesar casillas ocupadas) sin provocar {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}ataques de oportunidad{/g}. Si el enemigo designado solo tiene un arma {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}cuerpo a cuerpo{/g}, ataca a la ciberáguila con el ataque que menos {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} cueste. Si el enemigo tiene un arma a distancia, dispara a la ciberáguila con el ataque que menos PA cueste, teniendo una posibilidad adicional de +50 % de {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impactar{/g} a sus propios aliados (suponiendo que haya alguno en un cono tras la ciberáguila). Después, la ciberáguila ataca al enemigo infligiendo un +{uip|Damage|53135057d69647a7854e578c5ef40bba} % de daño y gastando 0 PA.
Mientras la ciberáguila está en esa casilla, el enemigo designado queda {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstruido{/g}.
Esta {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} se puede usar varias veces por {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}, pero cada uso durante un mismo {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g} incrementa el coste en +1 PA hasta el final del asalto.
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} chooses an enemy in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} and an unoccupied cell adjacent to it. The cyber-eagle moves to that cell (can move through occupied cells) without provoking {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}. If the designated enemy only has a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon, it attacks the cyber-eagle, using the lowest {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}-cost attack. If that enemy has a ranged weapon, it shoots at the cyber-eagle, using the lowest AP-cost attack, with an additional +50% chance to {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} that enemy's allies (if there are any within a cone behind the cyber-eagle). Then, the cyber-eagle attacks this enemy, dealing +{uip|Damage|53135057d69647a7854e578c5ef40bba}% more damage and spending 0 AP.
While the cyber-eagle is in that cell, the designated enemy is {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstructed{/g}.
This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} can be used multiple times per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, but each subsequent use within a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} increases its cost by +1 AP until the end of round.

traits.locale_text:
El supervisor elige a un enemigo al que tenga línea de visión y una casilla vacía adyacente a él. La ciberáguila se mueve a esa casilla (pudiendo atravesar casillas ocupadas) sin provocar ataques de oportunidad. Si el enemigo designado solo tiene un arma cuerpo a cuerpo, ataca a la ciberáguila con el ataque que menos PA cueste. Si el enemigo tiene un arma a distancia, dispara a la ciberáguila con el ataque que menos PA cueste, teniendo una posibilidad adicional de +50 % de impactar a sus propios aliados (suponiendo que haya alguno en un cono tras la ciberáguila). Después, la ciberáguila ataca al enemigo infligiendo un +{uip|Damage|53135057d69647a7854e578c5ef40bba} % de daño y gastando 0 PA.
Mientras la ciberáguila está en esa casilla, el enemigo designado queda {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstruido{/g}.
Esta capacidad se puede usar varias veces por turno, pero cada uso durante un mismo asalto incrementa el coste en +1 PA hasta el final del asalto.

El supervisor elige a un enemigo al que tenga {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}línea de visión{/g} y una casilla vacía adyacente a él. La ciberáguila se mueve a esa casilla (pudiendo atravesar casillas ocupadas) sin provocar {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}ataques de oportunidad{/g}. Si el enemigo designado solo tiene un arma cuerpo a cuerpo, ataca a la ciberáguila con el ataque que menos {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} cueste. Si el enemigo tiene un arma a distancia, dispara a la ciberáguila con el ataque que menos PA cueste, teniendo una posibilidad adicional de +50 % de {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impactar{/g} a sus propios aliados (suponiendo que haya alguno en un cono tras la ciberáguila). Después, la ciberáguila ataca al enemigo infligiendo un +{uip|Damage|53135057d69647a7854e578c5ef40bba} % de daño y gastando 0 PA.
Mientras la ciberáguila está en esa casilla, el enemigo designado queda {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstruido{/g}.
Esta {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} se puede usar varias veces por turno, pero cada uso durante un mismo asalto incrementa el coste en +1 PA hasta el final del asalto.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}監督官{/g}は{g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}視線{/g}の中にいる敵とその隣の空いているセルを選択する。サイバーイーグルは{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}機会攻撃{/g}を引き起こすことなくそのセルに移動する（埋まっているセルを通り抜けて移動可能）。指定された敵が{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接{/g}武器しか持っていない場合、{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}消費量が一番少ない攻撃でサイバーイーグルを攻撃する。敵が遠隔武器を持っている場合、味方に{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}当たる{/g}確率が+50%追加された状態で、AP消費量が一番少ない攻撃でサイバーイーグルを攻撃する（サイバーイーグルの後ろの扇状範囲内に敵の味方がいる場合）。その後、サイバーイーグルは敵を攻撃し、0APで+{uip|Damage|53135057d69647a7854e578c5ef40bba}%の追加ダメージを与える。
サイバーイーグルがそのセルにいる間、指定された敵は{g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}妨害される{/g}。
この{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}は1{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}に複数回使用できるが、ターン終了時まで1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}内で使用するたびにコストが+1AP増える。
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} chooses an enemy in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} and an unoccupied cell adjacent to it. The cyber-eagle moves to that cell (can move through occupied cells) without provoking {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}. If the designated enemy only has a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon, it attacks the cyber-eagle, using the lowest {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}-cost attack. If that enemy has a ranged weapon, it shoots at the cyber-eagle, using the lowest AP-cost attack, with an additional +50% chance to {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} that enemy's allies (if there are any within a cone behind the cyber-eagle). Then, the cyber-eagle attacks this enemy, dealing +{uip|Damage|53135057d69647a7854e578c5ef40bba}% more damage and spending 0 AP.
While the cyber-eagle is in that cell, the designated enemy is {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstructed{/g}.
This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} can be used multiple times per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, but each subsequent use within a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} increases its cost by +1 AP until the end of round.

traits.locale_text:
監督官は視線の中にいる敵とその隣の空いているセルを選択する。サイバーイーグルは機会攻撃を引き起こすことなくそのセルに移動する（埋まっているセルを通り抜けて移動可能）。指定された敵が近接武器しか持っていない場合、AP消費量が一番少ない攻撃でサイバーイーグルを攻撃する。敵が遠隔武器を持っている場合、味方に当たる確率が+50%追加された状態で、AP消費量が一番少ない攻撃でサイバーイーグルを攻撃する（サイバーイーグルの後ろの扇状範囲内に敵の味方がいる場合）。その後、サイバーイーグルは敵を攻撃し、0APで+{uip|Damage|53135057d69647a7854e578c5ef40bba}%の追加ダメージを与える。
サイバーイーグルがそのセルにいる間、指定された敵は{g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}妨害される{/g}。
このアビリティは1ターンに複数回使用できるが、ターン終了時まで1ラウンド内で使用するたびにコストが+1AP増える。

監督官は視線の中にいる敵とその隣の空いているセルを選択する。サイバーイーグルは機会攻撃を引き起こすことなくそのセルに移動する（埋まっているセルを通り抜けて移動可能）。指定された敵が近接武器しか持っていない場合、AP消費量が一番少ない攻撃でサイバーイーグルを攻撃する。敵が遠隔武器を持っている場合、味方に当たる確率が+50%追加された状態で、AP消費量が一番少ない攻撃でサイバーイーグルを攻撃する（サイバーイーグルの後ろの扇状範囲内に敵の味方がいる場合）。その後、サイバーイーグルは敵を攻撃し、0APで+{uip|Damage|53135057d69647a7854e578c5ef40bba}%の追加ダメージを与える。
サイバーイーグルがそのセルにいる間、指定された敵は{g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}妨害される{/g}。
このアビリティは1ターンに複数回使用できるが、ターン終了時まで1ラウンド内で使用するたびにコストが+1AP増える。

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Gözetmen{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}görüş hattındaki{/g} bir düşmanı ve o düşmanın bitişiğindeki boş bir hücreyi seçer. Siber kartal, {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}fırsat saldırılarını{/g} tetiklemeden o hücreye doğru ilerler (dolu hücrelerden geçebilir). Seçilen düşman, yalnızca {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}yakın dövüş{/g} silahına sahipse en az {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}EP{/g} harcayan saldırısıyla siber kartala saldırır. Aynı düşman, menzilli silaha sahipse en az EP harcayan saldırısıyla siber kartala ateş eder. Bu saldırının o düşmanın dost birimlerini {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vurma{/g} olasılığı +%50 daha fazla olur (siber kartalın arkasındaki konilik bir alan içinde bir dost birimi varsa). Ardından siber kartal, bu düşmana saldırarak +%{uip|Damage|53135057d69647a7854e578c5ef40bba} daha fazla hasar verir ve 0 EP harcar.
Seçilen düşman, siber kartal o hücredeyken {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}engellenir{/g}.
Bu {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyet{/g}, bir {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tur{/g} içinde birden çok kez kullanılabilir ancak bir {g|Encyclopedia:Round}raunt{/g} içinde her kullanıldığında bedeli o raunt sona erene dek bir öncekine göre +1 EP artar.
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} chooses an enemy in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} and an unoccupied cell adjacent to it. The cyber-eagle moves to that cell (can move through occupied cells) without provoking {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}. If the designated enemy only has a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon, it attacks the cyber-eagle, using the lowest {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}-cost attack. If that enemy has a ranged weapon, it shoots at the cyber-eagle, using the lowest AP-cost attack, with an additional +50% chance to {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} that enemy's allies (if there are any within a cone behind the cyber-eagle). Then, the cyber-eagle attacks this enemy, dealing +{uip|Damage|53135057d69647a7854e578c5ef40bba}% more damage and spending 0 AP.
While the cyber-eagle is in that cell, the designated enemy is {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstructed{/g}.
This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} can be used multiple times per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, but each subsequent use within a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} increases its cost by +1 AP until the end of round.

traits.locale_text:
Gözetmen, görüş hattındaki bir düşmanı ve o düşmanın bitişiğindeki boş bir hücreyi seçer. Siber kartal, fırsat saldırılarını tetiklemeden o hücreye doğru ilerler (dolu hücrelerden geçebilir). Seçilen düşman, yalnızca yakın dövüş silahına sahipse en az EP harcayan saldırısıyla siber kartala saldırır. Aynı düşman, menzilli silaha sahipse en az EP harcayan saldırısıyla siber kartala ateş eder. Bu saldırının o düşmanın dost birimlerini vurma olasılığı +%50 daha fazla olur (siber kartalın arkasındaki konilik bir alan içinde bir dost birimi varsa). Ardından siber kartal, bu düşmana saldırarak +%{uip|Damage|53135057d69647a7854e578c5ef40bba} daha fazla hasar verir ve 0 EP harcar.
Seçilen düşman, siber kartal o hücredeyken {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}engellenir{/g}.
Bu kabiliyet, bir tur içinde birden çok kez kullanılabilir ancak bir raunt içinde her kullanıldığında bedeli o raunt sona erene dek bir öncekine göre +1 EP artar.

Gözetmen, görüş hattındaki bir düşmanı ve o düşmanın bitişiğindeki boş bir hücreyi seçer. Siber kartal, fırsat saldırılarını tetiklemeden o hücreye doğru ilerler (dolu hücrelerden geçebilir). Seçilen düşman, yalnızca yakın dövüş silahına sahipse en az EP harcayan saldırısıyla siber kartala saldırır. Aynı düşman, menzilli silaha sahipse en az EP harcayan saldırısıyla siber kartala ateş eder. Bu saldırının o düşmanın dost birimlerini vurma olasılığı +%50 daha fazla olur (siber kartalın arkasındaki konilik bir alan içinde bir dost birimi varsa). Ardından siber kartal, bu düşmana saldırarak +%{uip|Damage|53135057d69647a7854e578c5ef40bba} daha fazla hasar verir ve 0 EP harcar.
Seçilen düşman, siber kartal o hücredeyken {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}engellenir{/g}.
Bu kabiliyet, bir tur içinde birden çok kez kullanılabilir ancak bir raunt içinde her kullanıldığında bedeli o raunt sona erene dek bir öncekine göre +1 EP artar.
